imdb.title: Dropkick on My Devil!!
imdb.plot: Yurine is a delusional gothic lolita who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan. They'll have to live together - until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

episodes.title: Episode #3.1
episodes.plot: As the girls hang out between changing art styles and playing Karuta, the lord of the Angels arrives on Earth ready to live among and destroy humanity.

episodes.title: Episode #3.2
episodes.plot: After the rest of the Fallen Angels find out about Lieree's arrival, Lieree explores Jinbocho following her vulnerability being accidentally revealed by Yurine. Meanwhile, Pino becomes extremely paranoid after swallowing her pills.

episodes.title: Episode #3.3
episodes.plot: When Jashin eats the orange of a Jizo statue, it begins to take effect into providing people with karma and misfortune, particularly on Mei Tachibana.

episodes.title: Episode #3.4
episodes.plot: After engaging in their regular antics back at home, Jashin decides the way to kill Yurine is dropping her down a pitfall near Pekora's house.

episodes.title: Episode #3.5
episodes.plot: As the devils' Hell School teacher, Persephone, begins to work at an orphanage and study human culture, she encounters Lierre, who has developed more childish desires while living in Jinbocho.

episodes.title: Episode #3.6
episodes.plot: After Jashin gets into trouble with the law financially and becomes wanted, she escapes to Kushiro to avoid being taken away, while Yurine and company try to track her down.

episodes.title: Episode #3.7
episodes.plot: Escaping to Obihiro from her debt collectors, Jashin decides to invest into making back her lost money by selling food and bidding on a local horse racing.

episodes.title: Episode #3.8
episodes.plot: Now having escaped to Minamishimabara, Jashin encounters several familiar faces from Jinbocho while trying to take over the Hara Castle.

episodes.title: Episode #3.9
episodes.plot: Traveling to Hokkaido, Medusa's rarest form being activated causes almost everyone to get high for a celebration, while Jashin reunites with a familiar face she once met. But will her fear of being caught by her debt collectors come true?

episodes.title: Episode #3.10
episodes.plot: Returning home to Jinbocho after the debt collector situation is solved, Jashin begins to question the whereabouts of both Yurine, and for the first time, her own life.

episodes.title: Episode #3.11
episodes.plot: As Lieree visits the Patra Exhibition with Persephone while giving into more of her childish nature, Jashin decides to good and donate to a blood donation, only to find a new species from hell has arrived to Jinbocho.

episodes.title: Episode #3.12
episodes.plot: When Ecute and Atre set out to recruit Yurine to join their clan of vampires, seeing her as the connection between Heaven, Hell, and Earth, Jashin's fate will be decided.

episodes.title: Yokoshima Kyouto no Tsudoi
episodes.plot: Tokyo, the big city. In the corner of this world, another day of bittersweet drama is about to unfold... According to Pekola the angel, Yurine the witch hosts a sabbath at a run-down apartment in Jinbocho. There, Jashin-chan the devil prepares a divine hot pot that captivates Yurine, Medusa, Minos and Pekola. But everything starts to fall apart when Jashin-chan brings drama to the dinner table.

episodes.title: Episode #1.10
episodes.plot: Charity workers ask for donations at the station as Pekola walks by with her well-earned pay. Tragedy strikes as her money vanishes into the donation box and her last 2,000 yen gets wasted for curry nanban eaten by Jashin-chan. Yusa and Koji reappear and Pekola works as Poporon's bodyguard. Valentine's Day stirs things up between Jashin-chan and Medusa and Jashin-chan's sleaziness goes on parade!

episodes.title: Episode #1.11
episodes.plot: Jashin-chan's killer dropkick hits Yurine, the finale is here! Turns out, Yurine's down with a cold. Ecstatic, Jashin-chan fantasizes of returning to Hell, but ends up taking care of her with Minos and Medusa. Pekola, Poporon and Mei join them for a flower viewing. After a devilish relapse at the bakery, Persephone II finally finds Jashin-chan, only to bid farewell as she floats off into space!
